014package org.microbean.bean;
015
016import java.util.Iterator;
017
018import java.util.function.Supplier;
019
020public interface References<R> extends AutoCloseable, Iterable<R>, Supplier<R> {
021
022  // Destroys r if and only if it is (a) dependent and (b) supplied by get()
023  public boolean destroy(final R r);
024
025  public default Cardinality cardinality() {
026    final Iterator<?> i = this.iterator();
027    if (i.hasNext()) {
028      i.next();
029      return i.hasNext() ? Cardinality.MANY : Cardinality.ONE;
030    }
031    return Cardinality.ZERO;
032  }
033
034  @Override // Supplier<R>
035  public default R get() {
036    final Iterator<R> iterator = this.iterator();
037    if (!iterator.hasNext()) {
038      throw new UnsatisfiedResolutionException();
039    }
040    final R returnValue = iterator.next();
041    if (iterator.hasNext()) {
042      throw new AmbiguousResolutionException();
043    }
044    return returnValue;
045  }
046
047  // Overriding encouraged to be more efficient/threadsafe/etc.
048  @Override // AutoCloseable
049  public default void close() {
050    for (final R r : this) {
051      this.destroy(r);
052    }
053  }
054
055  public static enum Cardinality {
056
057    ZERO,
058    ONE,
059    MANY
060
061  }
062
063}
